channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Feasts and Food of Advent
item.description: A season of joyful preparation leads us to Christmas.

item.title: Atlantic CEO Nick Thompson on how he learned to ‘just keep moving forward’ after his famous firing at 22
item.description: Thompson was fired on his first—and last—day at CBS News' flagship 60 Minutes. Fifteen years later, he heard what Steve Kroft really thought about it.

item.title: Trump's election win filled Hamas with 'fear,' hostage held like 'slave' for 505 days recounts

item.title: What a Bodega Taught the Socialist
item.description: Zohran Mamdani now says he wants to cut red tape for NYC small businesses. He should apply that epiphany across the board.

item.title: So Jasmine Crockett Is Republicans’ Fault Now?
item.description: Media-amplified allegations that the GOP tricked her into running for Senate give the egotistical Texas rep far too little credit.

item.title: The True Toll of Conspiracy Theories
item.description: I witnessed Charlie Kirk’s murder. Conspiracy theorists are only making this heinous act worse.

item.title: FBI ousts reinstated whistleblower over unauthorized media talks, ‘poor judgment’

item.title: The first-term congressman leading the GOP’s midterm House campaign says Trump is intimately involved in recruitment decisions
item.description: Trump’s involvement contrasts with 2017, when he was not as tied to House leadership, on details of the midterm campaign as he is now.

item.title: U.S. troops have been on the ground in Syria for over a decade. Here’s the back story and present situation after the deadly Islamic State attack
item.description: The number of U.S. troops in the country has fluctuated and currently stands at around 900.

item.title: Police have person of interest in custody over Brown University shooting that killed 2, wounded 9
item.description: Separately, an FBI agent said that the arrest occurred at a Hampton Inn hotel in Coventry, about 20 miles from Providence.

item.title: The Florida Highwaymen: Outsider Art, Tourism, and American Landscape
item.description: The fascinating story of black artists whose flamboyant colors, ocean waves, and swaying palms defined Florida for a generation of tourists.

item.title: Sen. Ron Johnson Asks DOJ To Investigate Judge Accused Of Misconduct In Trump Lawyers’ Trial
item.description: A judge with a 'grudge' against one of the defendants allegedly ghostwrote Wisconsin Judge John Hyland's August order denying a dismissal motion.

item.title: If Time Magazine Weren’t So Corrupt, It Would Have Made Charlie Kirk Person Of The Year
item.description: TIME could have used the credibility that choosing him would have helped restore.

item.title: ADF: Employees Can’t Be Forced To Lie About Pronouns At Work
item.description: Employees don't have to insist on calling people by pronouns they don’t like. But they don’t have to say something they know is not true.
